resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107068</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107068</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770212490</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Basic Elements of Music</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die grundlegenden Elemente von Musik</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les éléments de base de la musique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os elementos básicos da música</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli elementi di base di musica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα βασικά στοιχεία της μουσικής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los elementos básicos de la música</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Explanations (suitable for any age) of the basic elements of music, with suggested activities for introducing the concepts to children at early elementary school level.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erklärungen (verwendbar während irgendeines 
Alters) der grundlegenden Elemente von Musik, mit vorgeschlagenen 
Aktivitäten für das Vorstellen der Konzepte zu den Kindern auf 
früher Volksschulestufe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Explications (appropriées à tout âge) des 
éléments de base de la musique, avec des activités suggérées pour
présenter les concepts aux enfants au niveau tôt d'école primaire.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Explanações (apropriadas para alguma idade) dos 
elementos básicos da música, com atividades sugeridas para 
introduzir os conceitos às crianças no nível adiantado da escola 
elementar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Spiegazioni (adatte a qualsiasi età) degli 
elementi di base di musica, con le attività suggerite per introdurre 
i concetti ai bambini al livello in anticipo della scuola elementare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξηγήσεις (κατάλληλες για οποιαδήποτε ηλικία) των 
βασικών στοιχείων της μουσικής, με τις προτεινόμενες 
δραστηριότητες για την εισαγωγή των εννοιών στα παιδιά σε πρόωρο 
επίπεδο δημοτικών σχολείων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Explicaciones (convenientes para cualquier edad) 
de los elementos básicos de la música, con las actividades sugeridas
para introducir los conceptos a los niños en el nivel temprano de la 
escuela primaria.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:CATHERINE SCHMIDT-JONES
FN:CATHERINE SCHMIDT-JONES
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770212490</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution 1.0</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107068</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/the-basic-elements-of-music</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
